resources.string: If you are not connected to the server, please send five .tsv files located in your Downloads to us.
Please change your position and resume writing.
Please enter at least %1$d characters per phase.

If you have not trained the model yet, go to the training screen and follow the instructions. After completing training phases, if you are not connected to the server, please send five files located in Downloads to us.\n If you are connected to the server and want to test whether the model recognizes you, navigate to the testing screen.
Chars left to type: %1$d\n Phases left to complete: %2$d
Enter the university ID by which you will be recognized
After writing 100 words, send for inference and wait for the reply from the server.
After writing 300 words, change your position, e.g. sit down, stand up, lay down etc.
Please do not change your writing style after completing each phase
